author: Giovanni Zottola
description: “Maui Tiki Tiki is a fictional figure of tiki culture: a trickster who ambushes the Sun God, forcing him to lengthen the days. My drink symbolises the character's personality: a strong cocktail, salty, spicy, sweet and warm like his achievements, but with that bitter edge.”
name: Maui Tiki Tiki
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Special ingredient #1: handmade maui base (taken from a six-hours cold-macerated paste made from lime and chilli demerara sugar)
